testCases.label: Test a positive even number
testCases.description: Verifies that the method correctly returns 'Even' for the positive integer 4.

testCases.label: Test the even case for zero
testCases.description: Verifies that the method correctly returns 'Even' for the integer 0.

testCases.label: Test a larger positive even number
testCases.description: Verifies that the method correctly returns 'Even' for the positive integer 12.

testCases.label: Test a positive odd number
testCases.description: Verifies that the method correctly returns 'Odd' for the positive integer 3.

testCases.label: Test a negative odd number
testCases.description: Verifies that the method correctly returns 'Odd' for the negative integer -5.
